question:
Which of the following are correct with respect to Cabinet Committees?
1. They are extra-constitutional in emergence
2. They are of two types–standing and ad hoc
3. They are set up by the Prime Minister
4. Their membership varies from three to fourteen
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Some of the features of Cabinet Committees are: (1) They are extra-constitutional in emergence, (2) They are of two types–standing and ad hoc, (3) They are set up by the Prime Minister, (4)  Their membership varies from three to eight.
